GUI

Class GUI

  • java.lang.Object
    • GUI.GUI

  • public class GUI
extends java.lang.Object
    The GUI class is the Graphical User Interface for the configuration of the AntiSpamFilter. It's a workspace of interaction with the representations of the imported rules, and provides means of evaluation the current set weights associated with each rule. Also runs an automated algorithm to optimize the weights of each rule in order to satisfy the requirements of an ProfessionalMailBox.
    Version:
    0.9
    Author:
    ES1-2017-IC1-70
